Autu Securities offers global financial market investment opportunities through derivatives, including stocks, futures, commodities, indices, and cryptocurrencies.

Autu Securities is a regulated online trading platform that provides access to all global financial markets through derivative such as futures, options, and CFDs. Here are the advantages of trading with Autu Securities:

Low trading costs

Industry’s most competitive zero-spread trading model
Direct connections to exchanges
Transparent quote history
Flexible leverage, enhancing the efficiency of capital usage

Our clients' continued profitability is the foundation of our success.

Open Account

Top-notch execution & trading conditions

Data centers housed within Equinix in London and New York
Trading products sourced from multiple global exchanges with high liquidity and extensive market depth
Connections to major global exchanges such as CME, CBOT, NYMEX, HKEX, SGX...
Advanced technology and server equipment employed in the trading system to ensure order execution speed

STP model (straight-through processing to exchanges)

All orders are directly passed to exchanges, ensuring transparent and fair trading

Implementing the STP model has always been our highest priority.We are committed to providing our clients with the highest-quality trading experience, enabling them to achieve better trading outcomes in financial markets such as stocks, futures, and cryptocurrencies.

Open Account

Empowering traders with AI, lowering the barriers to entry into the professional field

Simple and convenient embedded automated trading tools
CHATGPT interface offered to high-end clients for strategy development assistance, aiding inexperienced clients in transforming trading strategies into automated trading systems
Embedded copy-trading system showcasing professional traders' trading strategies, promoting mutual learning and inspiration
Multiple trading tools and market analysis, such as financial calendars, charting tools, technical indicators, and open APIs, helping users make more informed trading decisions.
